list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pursue and kill (a wild animal) for sport or food.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the autumn they hunted deer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vào mùa thu họ săn hươu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: search determinedly for someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he desperately hunted for a new job
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã săn lùng một cách tuyệt vọng cho một công việc mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a device or system) oscillate around a desired speed, position, or state.
(in change-ringing) move the place of a bell in a simple progression.
an act of hunting wild animals or game.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: police launched a hunt for the killer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đã phát động một cuộc săn lùng kẻ giết người

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an oscillating motion around a desired speed, position, or state.
